snippet: Alex Bentley scored 24 points, and Chiney Ogwumike added 20 as the Connecticut Sun withstood a furious rally to beat the host Liberty, 83-75.
abstract: Connecticut Sun beats New York Liberty, 83-75; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Alex Bentley scored 24 points, and Chiney Ogwumike added 20 as the Connecticut Sun withstood a furious rally to beat the host Liberty, 83-75.

headline.main: Liberty Rally Falls Short in 83-75 Loss to Sun
headline.print_headline: Liberty Rally Falls Short in 83-75 Loss to Sun
